not_found: The page you are looking for cannot be found.
invite_vue_fes: Would you like to join Vue Fes Japan 2024 as well?
share_namecard: Let's share this name card on social media!

top_page.latest_information: Get the latest information on our official social media

store.payment_method_explain: There are two methods of payment.
store.tshirt_detail: Vue Fes Japan 2023 のオリジナル T シャツです。サイズはS・M・L・XLの4種類。前面のみのプリントです。
store.parka_detail: Vue Fes Japan 2023 のオリジナルパーカーです。サイズは S、M、L、XL の4種類。前・背面プリントです。
store.vue_badge_detail: Vue.jsのロゴを使ったミニサイズのアクリルピンバッジです。
store.nuxt_badge_detail: Nuxtのロゴを使ったミニサイズのアクリルピンバッジです。
store.vite_badge_detail: Viteのロゴを使ったミニサイズのアクリルピンバッジです。
store.sticker_detail: Vue.js、Nuxt、Vite、Vue Fes Japanのロゴが集まった特製ステッカーです。
store.cushion_detail: 表面Vue.js、裏面Vue Fes Japanのロゴのふかふかクッションです。素材は、触り心地が良いブランケットのような生地です。

sponsor.title: Sponsors
sponsor.creative_wall_drinks_snacks_merchandise: Creative Wall, Drinks, Snacks, Merchandise sponsor

handsOn.title: Hands On
handsOn.details1: *Additionally, the purchase of either a regular ticket or a regular + after-party ticket is required.
handsOn.details2: *For more details, please refer to the Hands-on section.

individualSponsor.title: Individual Sponsor
individualSponsor.details1: *For those attending on the day, the purchase of either a regular ticket or a regular + after-party ticket is required.
individualSponsor.details2: *For more details, please refer to the Individual Sponsor section.

access.title: Access
access.name: Place：OTEMACHI PLACE HALL & CONFERENCE
access.address: 1F/2F, OTEMACHI PLACE(EAST TOWER), 2-3-1, OTEMACHI, CHIYODA-KU, TOKYO
access.route_1: Walk 7 minutes from the Marunouchi North Exit of Tokyo Station from the JR Yamanote Line, Keihin Tohoku Line, Tokaido Shinkansen etc.
access.route_2: Directly connected to Exit A5 of Otemachi Station on the Tokyo Metro Marunouchi Line, Tozai Line, Chiyoda Line, Hanzomon Line and the Toei Mita Line

merit1.title: Credit Listing
merit1.detail: We will feature your name on the Vue Fes Japan official website (upon request).

merit2.title: Vue Fes Japan 2024 Staff Exclusive T-shirt
merit2.detail: You will receive a limited edition T-shirt available exclusively to staff members.
merit2.caution:
- Sizes range from S to XXXL. Please specify your size when purchasing tickets.
- T-shirts will be distributed only at the venue on the day of the event. Shipping is not available.

merit3.title: Priority Entry
merit3.detail: We will provide a dedicated priority lane for individual sponsors at the on-site registration. This allows for smooth entry without having to wait in line.

merit4.title: Priority Seating
merit4.detail: Priority seating will be provided at the front row of each track venue.
merit4.caution: *If seats are available after the session begins, they will be open to general attendees as well.*

namecard.sectionTitle1: ＼  With your avatar and name on it!  ／
namecard.dialog_message: To create a name card, you need to purchase a ticket in advance. After purchasing your ticket, log in using one of the following social accounts and register the necessary information.
namecard.complete_message: We will now verify your order number. You can check the status of the order number verification on the name card page. Please ensure that the verification is successfully completed before the editing deadline.
namecard.lets_share: Share your created name card on social media!

form.annotation_name: Up to 12 full-width characters (24 half-width characters)
form.annotation_avatar: *  Upload a square image (aspect ratio 1:1) for your avatar.
form.registrationCompleted: The name card information has been successfully registered!
